      • generateRandomName

        public static java.lang.String generateRandomName()
        Generates and returns a random name for a matrix map.
        Returns:
        A random matrix map name. Never null.

      • isValidMatrixTableName

        public static boolean isValidMatrixTableName(java.lang.String mapName)
        Checks if the given string is a valid matrix map name.
        Parameters:
        mapName - The map name to check. May be null.
        Returns:
        true if the given map name is a valid matrix map name, or false if it is syntactically invalid or null.

      • assertIsValidMatrixTableName

        public static void assertIsValidMatrixTableName(java.lang.String mapName)
        Asserts that the given map name is a valid matrix map name.

        If the map name matches the syntax, this method does nothing. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.

        Parameters:
        mapName - The map name to verify.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if the map name is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the map name is no syntactically valid matrix table name.
        See Also:
        isValidMatrixTableName(String)
